mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (bord_catg, bord_titl, bord_cont, user_id, bord_date, bord_hitc, bord_wrip) VALUES (#{bord_catg},#{bord_titl},#{bord_cont},#{user_id},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,0,#{bord_wrip})
mapper.select: SELECT b.bord_id, b.bord_catg, c.catg_name, b.bord_titl, b.bord_cont, b.user_id, u.nickname, b.bord_date, b.bord_hitc, b.bord_wrip FROM board b JOIN category c ON b.bord_catg = c.catg_id LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.bord_id = #{bord_id}
SELECT catg_id, catg_name, catg_crdt FROM category ORDER BY catg_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file (bord_id, file_olnm, file_svnm) VALUES (#{bord_id},#{file_olnm},#{file_svnm})
mapper.select: SELECT file_id, bord_id, file_olnm, file_svnm, file_date FROM board_file WHERE bord_id = #{bord_id}
SELECT bord_id, file_olnm, file_svnm, file_date FROM board_file WHERE file_id = #{file_id}
